Articles.Content:
Salutations.

I need a couple answers about the Mun, and then this thread goes down.

How many major craters are there?

How many Munoliths, on Kerbin and Mun?

Thanks!
I believe there are four munoliths. Using the muon detector, I\'ve pinpointed two and acquired partial triangulation on two more.

3 on the Mun, 3 on Kerbin.

Lots of craters.

Well, I now say that there are 8 craters - which fits in with my idea perfectly.

Now, how many Munoliths?

I\'ve found one in a location that I imagined while reading the book...

On a mound in the centre of a crater.

Hope this helps.
I\'ve found 3 munoliths, I\'m pretty sure thats all of them too

Please tell me this numerology does not mean the ponies might be escaping their designated thread?

(I have no interest in the show, just assuming the worst here.)

Please tell me this numerology does not mean the ponies might be escaping their designated thread?

(I have no interest in the show, just assuming the worst here.)

Nope, no nightmare moon :

However, this is RP-related, though I don\'t care to tell you yet.
If it is RP related please note that Terrestria has a Mun base next to one of the Munliths... S:|

If it is RP related please note that Terrestria has a Mun base next to one of the Munliths... S:|

It\'s RP related, but not physically.
No threat to my station then... Phew...
